detectors.description:
PrivatixServiceContract.popupServiceOffering(bytes32,uint8,string) (PrivatixServiceContract_5562.sol#585-606) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(service_offering_s[_offering_hash].agent_address == msg.sender) (PrivatixServiceContract_5562.sol#594)

PrivatixServiceContract.removeServiceOffering(bytes32) (PrivatixServiceContract_5562.sol#561-581) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(service_offering_s[_offering_hash].agent_address == msg.sender) (PrivatixServiceContract_5562.sol#567)
